remarks: A transfinite induction scheme in "implicit" form where the induction is done on an object derived from the object of interest.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Aug-2015.)
statement:
tfisi.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tfisi.b $e |- ( ph -> T e. On ) $.
tfisi.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( R e. On /\ R C_ T ) /\ A. y ( S e. R -> ch ) ) -> ps ) $.
tfisi.d $e |- ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
tfisi.e $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
tfisi.f $e |- ( x = y -> R = S ) $.
tfisi.g $e |- ( x = A -> R = T ) $.
tfisi $p |- ( ph -> th ) $.
$d A x $.
$d R y $.
$d S x $.
$d T x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
$d th x $.
